title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for chatting with any Ollama model; styled like ChatGPT.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama LLMs and embeddings; drop-in replacement for OpenAI in chains & agents.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Lightweight Java client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list, copy and delete models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, push, list and delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI tool built with Node.js for chatting with Ollama models from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension for chatting with Ollama inside a sidebar panel; supports code generation & explanation.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for running Ollama in containers.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama, LangChain and Chroma in <50 lines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with optional thread context.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI for Ollama with session memory and model selector dropdown.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package: JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama with full API coverage and types.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package: Python client for Ollama with sync & async APIs and automatic retries.

title: ollama on Reddit
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama users: model recommendations, troubleshooting, showcases and feature requests.
